sections.summary: business analyst versed in data mapping and user acceptance testing, as well as solving complex problems in high-pressure environments. excels at cultivating, managing and leveraging client relationships. highlights business process improvement business systems analysis business requirements matrixes ability to produce executive level reports and presentations project management user acceptance testing advanced problem solving abilities forecasting and planning
